class TestApiMetaDataEntityUnit(unittest.TestCase):
    """Unit test class for the ApiMetaDataEntity table"""

    def test_api_metadata_entity_from_dict(self):
        """
        Asserts ApiMetaDataEntity.from_dict values are constructed correctly
        """   

        # Arrange
        expected_partition_key = "bankPartitionKey"
        expected_row_key = "bankRowKey"
        expected_bronze_latest_path = "bankPath"
        expected_enabled = "true"
        expected_index = 10000
        expected_method = "GET"
        expected_next_cursor = "nextCursor"
        expected_record_count_to_request = 5000
        expected_silver_latest_delta_path = "silverDeltaPath"
        expected_silver_latest_full_path = "silverFullPath"
        expected_version = "v1"

        mock_table_response = {
            'PartitionKey': 'bankPartitionKey',
            'RowKey': 'bankRowKey',
            'BronzeLatestPath': 'bankPath',
            'Enabled': 'true',
            'Index': 10000,
            'Method': 'GET',
            'NextCursor': 'nextCursor',
            'RecordCountToRequest': 5000,
            'SilverLatestDeltaPath': 'silverDeltaPath',
            'SilverLatestFullPath': 'silverFullPath',
            'Version': 'v1'
        }

        # Act
        api_metadata_entity = ApiMetaDataEntity.from_dict(mock_table_response)

        partition_key_result = api_metadata_entity.partition_key
        row_key_result = api_metadata_entity.row_key
        bronze_latest_path_result = api_metadata_entity.bronze_latest_path
        enabled_result = api_metadata_entity.enabled
        index_result = api_metadata_entity.index
        method_result = api_metadata_entity.method
        next_cursor_result = api_metadata_entity.next_cursor
        record_count_to_request_result = api_metadata_entity.record_count_to_request
        silver_latest_delta_path_result = api_metadata_entity.silver_latest_delta_path
        silver_latest_full_path_result = api_metadata_entity.silver_latest_full_path
        version_result = api_metadata_entity.version

        # Assert
        assert partition_key_result == expected_partition_key, f"Expected {expected_partition_key} partition key, but got {partition_key_result}"
        assert row_key_result == expected_row_key, f"Expected {expected_row_key} row key, but got {row_key_result}"
        assert bronze_latest_path_result == expected_bronze_latest_path, f"Expected {expected_bronze_latest_path} bronze latest path, but got {bronze_latest_path_result}"
        assert enabled_result == expected_enabled, f"Expected {expected_enabled} enabled, but got {enabled_result}"
        assert index_result == expected_index, f"Expected {expected_index} index, but got {index_result}"
        assert method_result == expected_method, f"Expected {expected_method} method, but got {method_result}"
        assert next_cursor_result == expected_next_cursor, f"Expected {expected_next_cursor} next cursor, but got {next_cursor_result}"
        assert record_count_to_request_result == expected_record_count_to_request, f"Expected {expected_record_count_to_request} record count to request, but got {record_count_to_request_result}"
        assert silver_latest_delta_path_result == expected_silver_latest_delta_path, f"Expected {expected_silver_latest_delta_path} silver latest delta path, but got {silver_latest_delta_path_result}"
        assert silver_latest_full_path_result == expected_silver_latest_full_path, f"Expected {expected_silver_latest_full_path} silver latest full path, but got {silver_latest_full_path_result}"
        assert version_result == expected_version, f"Expected {expected_version} version, but got {version_result}"

    def test_api_metadata_entity_to_dict(self):
        """
        Asserts ApiMetaDataEntity.to_dict values are constructed correctly
        """   

        # Arrange
        expected_partition_key = "bankPartitionKey"
        expected_row_key = "bankRowKey"
        expected_bronze_latest_path = "bankPath"
        expected_enabled = "true"
        expected_index = 10000
        expected_method = "GET"
        expected_next_cursor = "nextCursor"
        expected_record_count_to_request = 5000
        expected_silver_latest_delta_path = "silverDeltaPath"
        expected_silver_latest_full_path = "silverFullPath"
        expected_version = "v1"

        mock_table_response = {
            'PartitionKey': 'bankPartitionKey',
            'RowKey': 'bankRowKey',
            'BronzeLatestPath': 'bankPath',
            'Enabled': 'true',
            'Index': 10000,
            'Method': 'GET',
            'NextCursor': 'nextCursor',
            'RecordCountToRequest': 5000,
            'SilverLatestDeltaPath': 'silverDeltaPath',
            'SilverLatestFullPath': 'silverFullPath',
            'Version': 'v1'
        }

        # Act
        api_metadata_entity = ApiMetaDataEntity.from_dict(mock_table_response)
        api_metadata_entity_dictionary = api_metadata_entity.to_dict()

        partition_key_result = api_metadata_entity_dictionary["PartitionKey"]
        row_key_result = api_metadata_entity_dictionary["RowKey"]
        bronze_latest_path_result = api_metadata_entity_dictionary["BronzeLatestPath"]
        enabled_result = api_metadata_entity_dictionary["Enabled"]
        index_result = api_metadata_entity_dictionary["Index"]
        method_result = api_metadata_entity_dictionary["Method"]
        next_cursor_result = api_metadata_entity_dictionary["NextCursor"]
        record_count_to_request_result = api_metadata_entity_dictionary["RecordCountToRequest"]
        silver_latest_delta_path_result = api_metadata_entity_dictionary["SilverLatestDeltaPath"]
        silver_latest_full_path_result = api_metadata_entity_dictionary["SilverLatestFullPath"]
        version_result = api_metadata_entity_dictionary["Version"]

        # Assert
        assert partition_key_result == expected_partition_key, f"Expected {expected_partition_key} partition key, but got {partition_key_result}"
        assert row_key_result == expected_row_key, f"Expected {expected_row_key} row key, but got {row_key_result}"
        assert bronze_latest_path_result == expected_bronze_latest_path, f"Expected {expected_bronze_latest_path} bronze latest path, but got {bronze_latest_path_result}"
        assert enabled_result == expected_enabled, f"Expected {expected_enabled} enabled, but got {enabled_result}"
        assert index_result == expected_index, f"Expected {expected_index} index, but got {index_result}"
        assert method_result == expected_method, f"Expected {expected_method} method, but got {method_result}"
        assert next_cursor_result == expected_next_cursor, f"Expected {expected_next_cursor} next cursor, but got {next_cursor_result}"
        assert record_count_to_request_result == expected_record_count_to_request, f"Expected {expected_record_count_to_request} record count to request, but got {record_count_to_request_result}"
        assert silver_latest_delta_path_result == expected_silver_latest_delta_path, f"Expected {expected_silver_latest_delta_path} silver latest delta path, but got {silver_latest_delta_path_result}"
        assert silver_latest_full_path_result == expected_silver_latest_full_path, f"Expected {expected_silver_latest_full_path} silver latest full path, but got {silver_latest_full_path_result}"
        assert version_result == expected_version, f"Expected {expected_version} version, but got {version_result}"
